statements: SELECT * FROM sql_activity_monitoring;
SELECT user_id, user_role FROM sql_activity_monitoring;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM sql_activity_monitoring WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM sql_activity_monitoring WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, user_role, transaction_amount FROM sql_activity_monitoring WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sql_activity_monitoring WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM sql_activity_monitoring WHERE user_role = 'Admin' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transactions_count FROM sql_activity_monitoring GROUP BY user_id HAVING transactions_count > 1;
SELECT transaction_date, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM sql_activity_monitoring WHERE user_id = 5 GROUP BY transaction_date;
SELECT user_id, user_role, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM sql_activity_monitoring GROUP BY user_id, user_role;
SELECT * FROM transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'debit' AND amount < 50
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM activity_log WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT log_id, query_text FROM activity_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'critical' ORDER BY alert_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT alert_id, log_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM activity_log ORDER BY log_id DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, query_text FROM activity_log WHERE user_id = 1001 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_id;
SELECT user_id, query_text FROM activity_log WHERE query_text LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_status FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_type, transaction_status FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_status = 'approved';
SELECT username, email FROM user_credentials WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_timestamp, action_taken, ip_address FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT alert_message, alert_level FROM security_alerts WHERE user_id = 456 AND alert_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM TransactionLogs ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM TransactionLogs WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM TransactionLogs GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM AccountAccessLogs WHERE action = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND log_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TransactionLogs WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM TransactionLogs GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions, transaction_type FROM TransactionLogs GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccountAccessLogs WHERE user_id = 123 AND action = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, ip_address, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE action = 'VIEW' GROUP BY user_id, ip_address ORDER BY total_logs DESC LIMIT 10;
